title: Coinbase, Microstrategy Shares Rally After Cboe Refiles Bitcoin ETF Applications
description: Shares in Coinbase, chosen as the market for the surveillance-sharing agreements in ETF applications, rose above $80 at around 11:30 ET on Monday.

title: Revolut to Delist Solana, Polygon, And Cardano After SEC ‘Security’ Label
description: Revolut is moving to delist the three tokens over what it says is regulatory uncertainty after the SEC labeled them securities.

title: World's Oldest Operational Coin Mint Opens Doors to New NFT Exhibit in Paris
description: Founded in AD 864, La Monnaie de Paris is now turning its attention to the future of money and art.

description:

title: DeFi salaries soar despite industry turmoil
description:
Salaries for decentralized finance (DeFi) engineers rose to an average of £142,500 during the fourth quarter of 2022 despite the issues the industry faced during the period, according to a July 3 press statement shared with CryptoSlate by talent advisory firm Durlston Partners. Durlston Partners attributed the increased salaries to the sector’s maturation, adding that […]

title: Bitcoin trading activity surges during US market hours, research shows
description: Research findings by K33, a digital assets platform, show a pattern in bitcoin trading, with increased activity during US market hours compared to Asian and European sessions.

title: Thai SEC Introduces New Rules for Digital Asset Providers
description:
Thailand’s SEC introduces regulations prioritizing investor protection in digital asset services. Clear risk warnings are mandated for cryptocurrency traders, noting the potential loss of investment. Restrictions are imposed on deposit and lending services by digital asset businesses, with limited exceptions. Thailand’s Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) introduced new regulations for digital asset service providers to […]
